It was the exact color as in the photo; however, the photo makes it look bulkier than it is. It's more of a fine gauge knit, and it's lightweight. It was a little wrinkled when I got it, so I put it in the dryer with a wet, wrung-out washcloth which took the few wrinkles it had right out and gave it a softer texture within 10 minutes. Fits perfectly true to the size described and has a great drape. Love the print, the fit, the quality, and the knit fabric. Thinking about getting it in another print.

I bought this for fall and I love it so much. The material and colors are beautiful and definitely add some excitement to any basic outfit. The sweater is soft and cozy, while being warm, yet breathable. The fit is true to size so if you want a more oversized sweater, then size up. Great price point and great sweater!
For the price this sweater is very thin. It’s pretty but it is not near as thick  as the picture shows it to be. I would not recommend for the price
It’s ok, light weight, not as bulky and fluffy as I hoped. The quality is not worth $46, if I hadn’t purchased it to go specifically with another item I would have sent it back.
The pics make this sweater look cozy and comfy. In actuality it’s thin and runs small kinda like Temu quality at a way too expensive price point
Not like the pictures.  Fits well, but not a thick sweater like it appears.

The blue color is very nice, this piece feels soft and has nice big pockets. I got an Xlg size so it wouldn’t be tight over clothes, but it ended up being even bigger than I thought. The sleeves hung way too long. My grand daughter is taller than me (5’8”), I’m (5’4”)…so I gave it to her and she loves it. Material is very thin. This would snag easily. You can hold it up to the light and see the tiny holes in the fabric. Not worth the price. Also has a smell to it.
Gorgeous, gorgeous, gorgeous 😍

Mixed feelings - I wish I had sized up to emulate the way it fits the girl in the picture, but my boobs are way bigger than hers so I usually try for a more tailored look. I love the pattern in the front but it doesn’t continue around across the seam, so somehow the pattern on the back is noticeably a face on my butt. I got “brown”. I like the brown. The other color contrasting with brown is sort of salmon? The fabric isn’t bad, it’s got a heathered pattern that makes it appear thinner than it is, it looks stretched to show a color from underneath, but really those are the color flecks where it is woven. It’s good for my purposes, which is an on/off/on/off sweater at school depending on where I’m at and the temp in the building, compared to if you could hang meat in my classroom that day, if I just ran up some stairs or maybe need to sit too still too long. The pockets will fit my (small) cell phone and the knit process on the reverse side of the fabric will probably snag on my rings.
Wish it was softer but still in love

评论详情: I normally wear XLG in sweaters and that size fit well for me in this sweater. I am 5’2” and about 180 lbs. The colors, olive and black, were as pictured but I had a hard time trying to figure out the fabric as I was not sure how warm it would be. That being said, this is pretty thin fabric and it looks like it would snag easily. So I did send it back.

It is a thinner sweater not super chunky, which is fine as I wanted something lightweight to throw on. Close up the pattern is okay, looks better further away. The material is thin but also feels cheaply made. I am afraid it will snag and stretch out easily. I will be returning.
The sweater is very pretty but I thought it would be a thicker sweater. I'm kinda disappointed with that, it looks much thicker.

Same as pictured!

This is a sweater material, does not look like some of the material others are posting, more for fall or cooler time of year. I bought a large based on reviews of wanting an oversized look. I washed and dried. It did shrink a little. Size up if you want a longer, bigger fit. It is pretty, boho fall look.

I purchased an XL in Army Green, and I'm shocked at how nice it is. The fabric feels soft and so nice to the touch. It's very true to size for an XL. It's the perfect weight for a nice Fall day, not thick or heavy. And it drapes sooo nicely while wearing it. I washed it on delicate in cold and let it air dry and it looks exactly the same. No shrinking, no change. I'm absolutely buying more of these in different colors before they sell out. Such a fantastic purchase!!

The color in the length and the shape of this sweater is just beautiful for fall that is coming. I wanted something that would go with black and white and red and brown and this sweater covers it all. It is beautiful and I am so excited to be able to wear it but right now we're in a heat wave it's just like a gift I can't wait to open. The fabric and the fit is fantastic and true to size
Like rustic country style and this sweater is great with jeans and boots.  I love it.

This sweater goes with everything! I bought the A-Wine Red in large about a month ago and I'm ordering another in Grey and red. I live in Oklahoma and it's a great sweater for layering where the weather changes all the time.  I would highly recommend this sweater for any season.
Great fit & quality was amazing

…which is why I love this cardigan so much. It’s SO comfortable. I get compliments every time I wear it out though. It pairs so easily with a T and jeans, but you can easily dress it up. My only minor complaint is that it gets really staticky. Not sure what’s to be done about that.

I had just looked at western jackets that had an indian weaving like this for $269.00 in the little town where I live .  So I consider this a real deal.
